title: How to Rule in Halo 2 or 3 on Multiplayer or Splitscreen

steps.headline: Know the map!
steps.description: If you are in a map you are not familiar with, you might as well be in the middle of nowhere with a gun.

steps.headline: Know the weapons!
steps.description: Knowing what each gun is best used for is important if you don't want to die. For instance, you wouldn't shoot someone right next to you with a rocket launcher or shoot a tank with a pistol.

steps.headline: Know your Friends!
steps.description: This sounds stupid but you should always take aim at the best player and try to kill him/her more than the other players. This makes the other players scared of you and less likely to want to find you. That is, unless they have a sniper rifle.

steps.headline: Get ready for the match.
steps.description: Have a cool and funny name like 'Pony Slayer' or 'Bullet on you'. If your name is your first name or something like 'Halo Dude', you probably won't be very scary.

steps.headline: Use the 'Smart Way' to kill your opponents if there are few people playing with you.
steps.description: 'Smart Way' means picking out ONE person with a sniper rifle or Rocket launcher, running away before they knew what hit them, hide again,and repeat.

steps.headline: Use the 'Fun Way' if you are just playing for fun or if you want to be brave and go all out.
steps.description: The Fun Way is taking two SMG's, Needlers, etc. and just going on a rampage.

steps.headline: Use the 'Oh my God' method if you want to be saying 'Oh yeah here I come' every couple of seconds.
steps.description: This means get in the biggest vehicle in the match and just shooting every freaking thing you see. Don't stop shooting because the vehicles never run out of ammo and you will be twice as scary.

methods.name: Near the End of The Game

steps.headline: Depending on the rules you're using, kill anything that moves.
If you are way ahead, blow yourself up a lot to show off.
If you're playing split-screen, hit your friend's controller to show off even more.

Knowing what each gun is best used for is important if you don't want to die. For instance, you wouldn't shoot someone right next to you with a rocket launcher or shoot a tank with a pistol. Know your Friends! This sounds stupid but you should always take aim at the best player and try to kill him/her more than the other players. This makes the other players scared of you and less likely to want to find you. That is, unless they have a sniper rifle. Get ready for the match. During The Game Use the 'Smart Way' to kill your opponents if there are few people playing with you. 'Smart Way' means picking out ONE person with a sniper rifle or Rocket launcher, running away before they knew what hit them, hide again,and repeat. Use the 'Fun Way' if you are just playing for fun or if you want to be brave and go all out. The Fun Way is taking two SMG's, Needlers, etc. and just going on a rampage. Use the 'Oh my God' method if you want to be saying 'Oh yeah here I come' every couple of seconds. This means get in the biggest vehicle in the match and just shooting every freaking thing you see. Don't stop shooting because the vehicles never run out of ammo and you will be twice as scary. Near the End of The Game Depending on the rules you're using, kill anything that moves.  If you are way ahead, blow yourself up a lot to show off.  If you're playing split-screen, hit your friend's controller to show off even more.
